description: Try our easy to follow Spicy Sardine Pasta recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Spicy Sardine Pasta Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Drain pasta and set aside. Heat tomato in the same pan for 4 minutes or until hot, adding hot sauce if desired. Add pasta, sardines, half of the parsley mixture, lemon juice and oil. Toss gently to combine. Serve sprinkled with remaining parsley mix and lemon wedges, green salad and crusty bread on the side.

Toss gently to combine. Serve sprinkled with remaining parsley mix and lemon wedges, green salad and crusty bread on the side.
